categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Wippet was a Cargo ferry used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

Wippet, escorted by Y-wings and its sister ship Redbill were to pick up Imperial munitions stolen by pirates with their own Cargo ferries Filcher and Riirdo to arrange a trade. However, Assault Gunboats followed by two stormtrooper transports arrived to reclaim the munitions. The Gunboats destroyed the pirate escort shuttles Devil and disabled both Filcher and Riirdo and arrested the crews and destroyed both Redbill and Wippet before they could escape to Hyperspace. The event was recorded to train future pilots such as Maarek Stele.
